imdb.title: Anthony Goldstein, Ravenclaw, Jewish Wizard
akas: Anthony Goldstein, Ravenclaw, Jewish Wizard (United States)
plot: Anthony Goldstein is the only Jewish kid at Hogwarts, and he's finally ready to tell his side of the Harry Potter story.
